altername_name: Neo Geo Cup '98: The Road to the Victory
name: ACA NEOGEO Neo Geo Cup '98: The Road to the Victory
overview: Neo Geo Cup '98: The Road to the Victory is a 2D arcade football/soccer game, different than Neo Geo Cup'98 - here, the playing field is side-scrolling, not vertical-scrolling. A player can choose out of 73 national teams. The game is based on Super Sidekicks 3: The Next Glory, and reuses animation from this game. Gameplay is typical for the genre - the player controls all footballers in the team, and must win matches with rivals. Three buttons are used for shot+low pass/sliding, high pass/tackle and short pass/player change.
